Comments_List: Learned a lot about the challenges of global governance.
You develop a thorough standing of the structure, essence and challenges of global governance today.
I learned a great deal about analyzing current problems in a methodical manner.
I learned about the key international players in global governance, and in particular learned that there is no global government but rather a multitude of nations working to cooperate.
Visit to the UN was awesome
I loved that the midterm and final papers weee left to our own imagination and creativity. That way we were all engaged with what we had chosen. I loved that!
Yes! I really enjoyed taking this course.
Yes I would strongly recommend this course. It is challenging intellectually but also very manangeable. The professor's experience is also unwatchable.
Yes if interested in the subject material
I would recommend this to a student who enjoys flexibility in paper topics as this worked out perfectly for my hopes while simultaneously teaching me a great deal
